description:
With Afolio, group photo sharing has never been easier.
Create an event, capture or upload pictures and share them with your friends and family. Everyone receives content in real time, can comment and download pictures, and even upload their own so you can all access everyone's pictures anywhere, anytime.

Everyone participates in making your event the most memorable ever!
Afolio is simply the easiest way to share photos together, all in one place.  

CONVENIENT: all your events in one place, with everyone's pictures uploading automatically.
FAST: upload your pictures over wi-fi, 4G LTE, or 3G so everyone can see them instantly.
EASY: sharing your pictures from your iPhone, iPad or even desktop computer has never been easier.
SAFE: you choose who you share with, and your photos are safe from being deleted by mistake.

Afolio is the perfect companion for group occasions such as:
* family gatherings
* weddings
* birthday parties
* college events
* group travel trips
* and many more! 

Create memories together with Afolio.
releaseNotes:
* Photo comments and caption display by default when viewing a photo
* Easily share an event by sharing the event QR code for others to scan from the app
* Easier sign up flow
